text: Mikala Münter (born 26 September 1968) is a Danish dressage rider. She has been racing for the United States since 2019. She was for Denmark at the 2014 World Equestrian Games. She was seventh place with the Danish team. Münter has also been in the 2014 Dressage World Cup Final in Lyon, France. She was able to be at the World Cup Final after her other rider, Anna Kasprzak, had to go out. In April 2015, Gundersen has also been in another World Cup Final in Las Vegas, Nevada. The finals went from April 15 to April 19. Gundersen was ninth place. Gunderson was at the 2015 European Dressage Championships in Aachen, Germany. She was eighth place. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Danish dressage riders Category:American equestrians Category:Danish sportspeople Category:Living people
title: Mikala Münter
